system.description: At 18th level creatures affected by an Organizational effigy wielded by you must make a Wisdom saving throw when they enter the area of your Commanding Presence or start their turn there. On a failed save, an affected creature suffers the Slowed condition until the beginning of its next turn. Creatures affected by an Individual Effigy suffer the same effects, but suffer the Encumbered condition instead on a failed save and the Slowed condition on a successful one.
